summary.span: ToolLocationHelper 提供用于查找 .NET Framework 和 .NET Framework SDK 目录和文件的实用工具方法。

span.span: ToolLocationHelper provides utility methods for locating .NET Framework and .NET Framework SDK directories and files.

summary.span: 注意：此类的所有公共方法都可用于 MSBuild 项目，以便在函数中使用-在项目评估期间，这些方法必须是安全的。

span.span: NOTE: All public methods of this class are available to MSBuild projects for use in functions - they must be safe for use during project evaluation.

span.span: Components may declare Min and Max OSVersions in the registry this value can be used filter directories returned based on whether or not the osversion is bounded by the Min and Max versions declared by the component.

span.span: If this value is blank or null no filtering is done

param.name: targetProcessorArchitecture
param.span: 正在面向的处理器体系结构。

span.span: What processor architecture is being targeted.

param.span: 这会确定按什么顺序搜索哪些注册表配置单元。

span.span: This determines which registry hives are searched in what order.

param.span: 在64位操作系统中，如果目标是64位 (目标 x64 或 ia64) 添加到64位 hive 第一次在32位 hive 中添加第二个。如果您不以64位 hive 为目标，则在32位 hive 中，仅添加到64位 hive 中的32位 hive 第二个。

span.span: On a 64 bit operating system we do the following If you are targeting 64 bit (target x64 or ia64) Add in the 64 bit hive first Add in the 32 bit hive second If you are not targeting a 64 bit Add in the 32 bit hive first Add in the 64 bit hive second On a 32 bit machine we only add in the 32 bit hive.

summary.span: 获取 AssemblyFoldersExInfo 的已排序列表，其中包含第三方程序集在生成和设计时要使用的目录的相关信息。

span.span: Get a sorted list of AssemblyFoldersExInfo which contain information about what directories the 3rd party assemblies are registered under for use during build and design time.

summary.span: 此方法将枚举 AssemblyFoldersEx 注册表位置，并返回 AssemblyFoldersExInfo 列表，其顺序与在引用程序集的设计和生成时搜索的顺序相同。

span.span: This method will enumerate the AssemblyFoldersEx registry location and return a list of AssemblyFoldersExInfo in the same order in which they will be searched during both design and build time for reference assemblies.

returns.span: AssemblyFoldersExInfo 列表

span.span: List of AssemblyFoldersExInfo

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举 `AssemblyFoldersEx` 注册表位置，并 `AssemblyFoldersExInfo` 按照在设计和生成时为引用程序集搜索它们的相同顺序返回列表。This method enumerates the `AssemblyFoldersEx` registry location and returns the list of `AssemblyFoldersExInfo` in the same order that they are searched for reference assemblies at design and build time. 在64位操作系统上，如果目标为64位，请在64位配置单元中添加，然后将其添加到32位 hive;如果目标为32位，请在32位 hive 中添加，然后添加64位 hive。On a 64-bit operating system, if targeting 64-bit, add in the 64-bit hive then the 32-bit hive; if targeting 32-bit, add in the 32-bit hive then the 64-bit hive. 在32位计算机上，仅添加32位配置单元。On 32-bit machine only add in the 32-bit hive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SDK 的路径会考虑调用进程的处理器体系结构环境信息，因此，它可能最终会是 "../bin/i64"，例如。The path for the SDK takes in consideration the processor architecture environment information for the calling process, so it might end up being ".../bin/i64", for example. 与 和不同， 此方法会检查文件是否存在，使无效 `fileName` 返回 null。Unlike and this method checks for the existence of the file, so that an invalid `fileName` returns null.

summary.span: 此方法将假定请求的 ReferenceAssemblyRoot 路径将为另外中的 ProgramFiles 目录。.Netframework 或 .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers，targetFrameworkVersion 为2.0、3.0、3.5 或4.0，我们将为旧版 .net framework 返回正确链接的引用程序集路径。

span.span: This method will assume the requested ReferenceAssemblyRoot path will be the ProgramFiles directory specified by Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles In additon when the .NETFramework or .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers are seen and targetFrameworkVersion is 2.0, 3.0, 3.5 or 4.0 we will return the correctly chained reference assembly paths for the legacy .net frameworks.

summary.span: 此链接将使用现有的 GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies 来生成引用程序集路径的列表。

span.span: This chaining will use the existing GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies to build up the list of reference assembly paths.

returns.span: 引用程序集位置的集合。

span.span: Collection of reference assembly locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法假定请求的 ReferenceAssemblyRoot 路径将是 ProgramFiles 目录，该目录由 System.environment.specialfolder. ProgramFiles 指定。This method assumes that the requested ReferenceAssemblyRoot path will be the ProgramFiles directory that is specified by Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles. 此外，当时。.Netframework 或 .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers，targetFrameworkVersion 为2.0、3.0、3.5 或4，则将返回旧 .NET Framework 版本的正确链接的引用程序集路径。In addition, when the .NETFramework or .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers are seen and targetFrameworkVersion is 2.0, 3.0, 3.5, or 4, the correctly chained reference assembly paths for the legacy .NET Framework versions will be returned. 此链接将使用现有的 GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies 来生成引用程序集路径的列表。This chaining will use the existing GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies to build up the list of reference assembly paths.

exception.span: 在 frameworkName 为 null 时。

span.span: When the frameworkName is null
